meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rahul Gupta Dan Lee Peter Karamitsos Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7720.

td.p: Rahul Gupta, a data engineer from Midlothian, Virginia
Dan Lee, a math professor from New York, New York
Peter Karamitsos, a software salesman from Elmhurst, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $51,000)

tr.td: COMPOSERS' COUNTRY OF BIRTH
(Alex: We're talking about the present-day country.)
A SECOND SCREEN EXPERIENCE
FRUITS & VEGETABLES
BOOK TALK
THAT WORD NEEDS PLURALIZATION
THE FABERGÉ MUSEUM
(Sarah of the Clue Crew: From the St. Petersburg Museum. The craftsmanship and excess of a bygone time.)
